test.command: $(MKDIR) -p $(REPORTDIR); \ $(CD) $(REPORTDIR); \ cp $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)..$(D)URLHelperTests$(D)URLHelperTests.jar$(Q) .; \ true URLHelperTests.jar ;\ $(Q)$(JDK_HOME)$(D)bin$(D)jar$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX)$(Q) xf URLHelperTests.jar; \ $(JAVA_COMMAND) $(JVM_OPTIONS) \ -DPATHSEP=$(Q)$(D)$(Q) -DCPDL=$(Q)$(P)$(Q) -DRUN_SCRIPT=$(RUN_SCRIPT) -DPROPS_DIR=$(PROPS_DIR) -DSCRIPT_SUFFIX=$(SCRIPT_SUFFIX) -DEXECUTABLE_SUFFIX=$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX) \ -DJAVA_EXE='$(JAVA_COMMAND) $(JVM_OPTIONS)' -DJAVA_HOME='$(JDK_HOME)' -DSCMODE=204 -DJVM_TEST_ROOT=$(Q)$(JVM_TEST_ROOT)$(Q) \ -DUTILSJAR=$(Q)$(JVM_TEST_ROOT)$(D)cmdLineTests$(D)utils$(D)utils.jar$(Q) \ -jar $(CMDLINETESTER_JAR) \ -config $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)ShareClassesCMLTests-1.xml$(Q) -xids all,$(PLATFORM),$(VARIATION),$(JAVA_VERSION) -plats all,$(PLATFORM),$(VARIATION) -xlist $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)exclude.xml$(Q) \ -nonZeroExitWhenError \ -outputLimit 300; \ $(TEST_STATUS)

$(MKDIR) -p $(REPORTDIR); \ $(CD) $(REPORTDIR); \ cp $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)..$(D)URLHelperTests$(D)URLHelperTests.jar$(Q) .; \ true URLHelperTests.jar ;\ $(Q)$(JDK_HOME)$(D)bin$(D)jar$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX)$(Q) xf URLHelperTests.jar; \ $(JAVA_COMMAND) $(JVM_OPTIONS) \ -DPATHSEP=$(Q)$(D)$(Q) -DCPDL=$(Q)$(P)$(Q) -DRUN_SCRIPT=$(RUN_SCRIPT) -DPROPS_DIR=$(PROPS_DIR) -DSCRIPT_SUFFIX=$(SCRIPT_SUFFIX) -DEXECUTABLE_SUFFIX=$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX) \ -DJAVA_EXE='$(JAVA_COMMAND) $(JVM_OPTIONS)' -DJAVA_HOME='$(JDK_HOME)' -DSCMODE=204 -DJVM_TEST_ROOT=$(Q)$(JVM_TEST_ROOT)$(Q) \ -DUTILSJAR=$(Q)$(JVM_TEST_ROOT)$(D)cmdLineTests$(D)utils$(D)utils.jar$(Q) \ -jar $(CMDLINETESTER_JAR) \ -config $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)ShareClassesCMLTests-2.xml$(Q) -xids all,$(PLATFORM),$(VARIATION),$(JAVA_VERSION) -plats all,$(PLATFORM),$(VARIATION) -xlist $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)exclude.xml$(Q) \ -nonZeroExitWhenError \ -outputLimit 300; \ $(TEST_STATUS)

$(MKDIR) -p $(REPORTDIR); \ $(CD) $(REPORTDIR); \ cp $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)..$(D)URLHelperTests$(D)URLHelperTests.jar$(Q) .; \ true URLHelperTests.jar ;\ $(Q)$(JDK_HOME)$(D)bin$(D)jar$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX)$(Q) xf URLHelperTests.jar; \ cp $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)..$(D)TokenHelperTests$(D)TokenHelperTests.jar$(Q) .; \ true TokenHelperTests.jar ;\ $(Q)$(JDK_HOME)$(D)bin$(D)jar$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX)$(Q) xf TokenHelperTests.jar; \ cp $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)..$(D)DataHelperTests$(D)DataHelperTests.jar$(Q) .; \ true DataHelperTests.jar ;\ $(Q)$(JDK_HOME)$(D)bin$(D)jar$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX)$(Q) xf DataHelperTests.jar; \ $(CD) .$(D)datacaching$(D)dataone.contents; \ $(CONVERT_TO_EBCDIC_CMD) \ $(Q)$(JDK_HOME)$(D)bin$(D)jar$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX)$(Q) cf dataone.jar *.txt; \ $(CD) ..$(D)..$(D); \ $(CD) .$(D)datacaching$(D)datatwo.contents; \ $(CONVERT_TO_EBCDIC_CMD) \ $(Q)$(JDK_HOME)$(D)bin$(D)jar$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX)$(Q) cf datatwo.jar *.txt; \ $(CD) ..$(D)..$(D); \ mv .$(D)datacaching$(D)dataone.contents$(D)dataone.jar .$(D)datacaching; \ mv .$(D)datacaching$(D)datatwo.contents$(D)datatwo.jar .$(D)datacaching; \ $(JAVA_COMMAND) $(JVM_OPTIONS) \ -DPATHSEP=$(Q)$(D)$(Q) -DCPDL=$(Q)$(P)$(Q) -DRUN_SCRIPT=$(RUN_SCRIPT) -DPROPS_DIR=$(PROPS_DIR) -DSCRIPT_SUFFIX=$(SCRIPT_SUFFIX) -DEXECUTABLE_SUFFIX=$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX) \ -DJAVA_EXE='$(JAVA_COMMAND) $(JVM_OPTIONS)' -DJAVA_HOME='$(JDK_HOME)' -DSCMODE=204 -DJVM_TEST_ROOT=$(Q)$(JVM_TEST_ROOT)$(Q) \ -DUTILSJAR=$(Q)$(JVM_TEST_ROOT)$(D)cmdLineTests$(D)utils$(D)utils.jar$(Q) \ -jar $(CMDLINETESTER_JAR) \ -config $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)ShareClassesCMLTests-3.xml$(Q) -xids all,$(PLATFORM),$(VARIATION),$(JAVA_VERSION) -plats all,$(PLATFORM),$(VARIATION) -xlist $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)exclude.xml$(Q) \ -nonZeroExitWhenError \ -outputLimit 300; \ $(TEST_STATUS)

$(MKDIR) -p $(REPORTDIR); \ $(CD) $(REPORTDIR); \ cp $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)..$(D)URLHelperTests$(D)URLHelperTests.jar$(Q) .; \ true URLHelperTests.jar ;\ $(Q)$(JDK_HOME)$(D)bin$(D)jar$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX)$(Q) xf URLHelperTests.jar; \ $(JAVA_COMMAND) $(JVM_OPTIONS) \ -DPATHSEP=$(Q)$(D)$(Q) -DCPDL=$(Q)$(P)$(Q) -DRUN_SCRIPT=$(RUN_SCRIPT) -DPROPS_DIR=$(PROPS_DIR) -DSCRIPT_SUFFIX=$(SCRIPT_SUFFIX) -DEXECUTABLE_SUFFIX=$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX) \ -DJAVA_EXE='$(JAVA_COMMAND) $(JVM_OPTIONS)' -DJAVA_HOME='$(JDK_HOME)' -DSCMODE=204 -DJVM_TEST_ROOT=$(Q)$(JVM_TEST_ROOT)$(Q) \ -DJDMPVIEW_EXE=$(Q)$(JDK_HOME)$(D)bin$(D)jdmpview$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX)$(Q) \ -DUTILSJAR=$(Q)$(JVM_TEST_ROOT)$(D)cmdLineTests$(D)utils$(D)utils.jar$(Q) \ -jar $(CMDLINETESTER_JAR) \ -config $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)ShareClassesCMLTests-4.xml$(Q) -xids all,$(PLATFORM),$(VARIATION),$(JAVA_VERSION),$(JCL_VERSION) -plats all,$(PLATFORM),$(VARIATION) -xlist $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)exclude.xml$(Q) \ -nonZeroExitWhenError \ -outputLimit 300; \ $(TEST_STATUS)

$(MKDIR) -p $(REPORTDIR); \ $(CD) $(REPORTDIR); \ cp $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)..$(D)URLHelperTests$(D)URLHelperTests.jar$(Q) .; \ true URLHelperTests.jar ;\ $(Q)$(JDK_HOME)$(D)bin$(D)jar$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX)$(Q) xf URLHelperTests.jar; \ $(JAVA_COMMAND) $(JVM_OPTIONS) \ -DPATHSEP=$(Q)$(D)$(Q) -DCPDL=$(Q)$(P)$(Q) -DRUN_SCRIPT=$(RUN_SCRIPT) -DPROPS_DIR=$(PROPS_DIR) -DSCRIPT_SUFFIX=$(SCRIPT_SUFFIX) -DEXECUTABLE_SUFFIX=$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX) \ -DJAVA_EXE='$(JAVA_COMMAND) $(JVM_OPTIONS)' -DJAVA_HOME='$(JDK_HOME)' -DSCMODE=204 -DJVM_TEST_ROOT=$(Q)$(JVM_TEST_ROOT)$(Q) \ -DJDMPVIEW_EXE=$(Q)$(JDK_HOME)$(D)bin$(D)jdmpview$(EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX)$(Q) \ -DUTILSJAR=$(Q)$(JVM_TEST_ROOT)$(D)cmdLineTests$(D)utils$(D)utils.jar$(Q) \ -jar $(CMDLINETESTER_JAR) \ -config $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)ShareClassesCMLTests-5.xml$(Q) -xids all,$(PLATFORM),$(VARIATION),$(JAVA_VERSION),$(JCL_VERSION) -plats all,$(PLATFORM),$(VARIATION) -xlist $(Q)$(TEST_RESROOT)$(D)exclude.xml$(Q) \ -nonZeroExitWhenError \ -outputLimit 300; \ $(TEST_STATUS)
